thread.title: Keryx privately sells $125mm of its convertible senior notes
thread.title_full: Keryx privately sells $125mm of its convertible senior notes

title: Keryx privately sells $125mm of its convertible senior notes
text:
Keryx privately sells $125mm of its convertible senior notes Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530760 Executive Summary 
Keryx Biopharmaceuticals Inc. (renal disease therapies) sold $125mm of its convertible zero-coupon senior notes due 2020 to funds managed by the Baupost Group; the notes convert to common at $3.74. (The company's stock averaged $3.66 at the time of the sale.) Some of the proceeds will support US marketing of Auryxia (ferric citrate)--a treatment for hyperphosphatemia in chronic kidney disease patients on dialysis--which was launched in December 2014.
